```{r}
set.seed(2178)
library(here)
ptm <- proc.time()
```


# Set the directory path
```{r}
directory <- here("results/PANDA")
```

# Get the file names in the directory
```{r}
file_names <- list.files(directory)
file_names
```

# Create a character vector to store the pairs
```{r}
pairs <- character()
```

# Generate pairs of file names
```{r}
for (i in 1:(length(file_names) - 1)) {
  for (j in (i + 1):length(file_names)) {
    pair <- paste0(file_names[i], " ", file_names[j])
    pairs <- c(pairs, pair)
  }
}
```

# Write the pairs to a text file
```{r}
output_file <- here("src/community_detection/file_pairs.txt")
writeLines(pairs, output_file)
```
